tooltip.extremeuranium.syringe.shiftdown: Hit §eRMBt§r with Uranium inside to inject Mobs/Players.
toolip.extremeuranium.decayed_tropical_f: A tropical fish, Uranium made it tastes bitter. Makes you feel your mining's faster.
toolip.extremeuranium.decayed_salmon: Rancid salmon from soaking in Uranium, makes you feel faster.
toolip.extremeuranium.decayed_cod: Uranium drenched Cod, it hurts to eat, but makes you feel stronger.
toolip.extremeuranium.decayed_pufferfish: The Uranium made it hurt worse.
